column3: News;Phnom Penh:------ A preliminary report says that a man was found hanging inside an Indian three-wheeled CityApp registered vehicle.------The discovery was made on the morning of March 1
column4: outside Calmette Hospital located in Chak district Daun Penh
column5: Phnom Penh.------The police are currently investigating and searching for relatives.------Fairly gruesome photos: ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/417554
